verbs.description: superman actor dean cain confronts tom [V: arnold] after he calls him a racist comedian and actor tom arnold who won an mtv movie award for his role in true lies alongside arnold schwarzenegger and jamie lee curtis got into a heated debate with former superman actor dean cain after arnold called cain a racist the row started when lgbtq activist group glaad questioned why dean cain was promoting … arnold schwarzenegger chelsea cain tom arnold actor dean cain gosnell tom arnold superman
